item.title: Please Help(Case 9157)
item.dc:creator: @_ballin_jr *ballin jr.*
item.description:
@_ballin_jr wrote:

Here:

[code] case 9157:
if (dialog) {
switch (dialogId) {
case 1:

					break;
				}
			}
			if (NpcDialogue == 126) {
				if(playerHasItem(995, 100000)) {
				NpcDialogue = 0;
				NpcDialogueSend = false;
				deleteItem(995, 100000);
				addItem(4351, 1);
				addItem(2688, 1);
			} else {
				sM("You do not have 100K!!");
				}
			}
			break;[/code]

item.title: Please Help(Case 9157)
item.dc:creator: @_ballin_jr *ballin jr.*
item.description:
@_ballin_jr wrote:

Ok, so I’m trying to add skillmasters but when I add this to case 9157, it won’t work:

if (NpcDialogue == 126) { if(playerHasItem(995, 100000)) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; deleteItem(995, 100000); addItem(4351, 1); addItem(2688, 1); } else { sM("You do not have 100K!!"); } }

Anyone know why it won’t work? Help plawks
